participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outdoorsy, loves challenges and new experiences.
participant_1.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i've a black lab named trooper. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.

participant_2.name: Clara
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, finds joy in crafts and baking.
participant_2.background: knitting is my passion. i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
